effect_entries.effect: Held: Each time the holder uses the same move consecutively, its power is increased by another 10% of its original, to a maximum of 100%.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consectutive uses of the same attack have a cumulative damage boost of 10%. Maximum 100% boost.

flavor_text_entries.text: An item to be held by a Pokémon. It boosts moves used consecutively, but only until a different move is used.
